pullrequest.title: Remove physics includes from gui and gui includes from rendering

content.raw:
Weird to see common using physics. It [doesn't link against the physics library](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/fe6d2cd414a9d2a3b70314fb2901b86edef129f6/gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-210); it's just `Plugin.hh` that uses some shared pointer typedef's from PhysicsTypes.hh.

Here's one other thing that could be removed:
~~~
diff -r 03e48ce8e841 gazebo/common/Battery_TEST.cc
--- a/gazebo/common/Battery_TEST.cc	Fri Sep 11 10:32:00 2015 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/common/Battery_TEST.cc	Tue Sep 15 12:06:04 2015 -0700
@@ -15,7 +15,6 @@
  *
 */
 
-#include "gazebo/physics/Model.hh"
 #include "gazebo/common/Battery.hh"
 #include "gazebo/test/ServerFixture.hh"
 #include "test/util.hh"
~~~
content.html:
Weird to see common using physics. It doesn't link against the physics library; it's just Plugin.hh that uses some shared pointer typedef's from PhysicsTypes.hh.

Here's one other thing that could be removed:

diff -r 03e48ce8e841 gazebo/common/Battery_TEST.cc
--- a/gazebo/common/Battery_TEST.cc Fri Sep 11 10:32:00 2015 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/common/Battery_TEST.cc Tue Sep 15 12:06:04 2015 -0700
@@ -15,7 +15,6 @@
  *
 */

-#include "gazebo/physics/Model.hh"
 #include "gazebo/common/Battery.hh"
 #include "gazebo/test/ServerFixture.hh"
 #include "test/util.hh"
